title: Clickbait
description: This dataset contains a collection of two types of headlines - clickbait and non-clickbait. The clickbait article headlines are collected from ï¿½BuzzFeedï¿½, ï¿½Upworthyï¿½, ï¿½ViralNovaï¿½, ï¿½Thatscoopï¿½, ï¿½Scoopwhoopï¿½ and ï¿½ViralStoriesï¿½. The non-clickbait article headlines are collected from ï¿½WikiNewsï¿½, ï¿½New York Timesï¿½, ï¿½The Guardianï¿½, and ï¿½The Hinduï¿½. The task is to accurately classify a headline into the clickbait or non-clickbait class.
